entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support more formats in json TimeOnlyConverter #83863
  • IsAssignableFrom isn't working with generic interfaces and classes #83858
  • MetadataLoadContext should support `Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints()` #83851
  • Wasm debugger test timing out #83847
  • Make ParameterBuilder abstract #83831
    8.0.0
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR for volatile variables #83830
  • [mono] invoke delegate method thunk hit asset. #83823
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to delete an instrument inside a Meter instance #83822
  • CertificateRequest RawData #83821
  • System.OutOfMemoryException when allocating jump stub on macOS ARM64 #83818
  • mono gc: assert on !sgen_concurrent_collection_in_progress #83817
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.BootTime doesn't work on Android #83816
  • record ToString Questions and suggestions #83812
  • [wasm] Project created from wasmbrowser template doesn't respect SDK from global.json #83811
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #83825
  • [API Proposal]: ToArray and ToList overloads with length argument #83807
  • assert in mono_marshal_ilgen_init #83804
  • Optimize block unrolling operations using AVX-512 #83798
    8.0.0

Closed

  • MarshalUsing does not work with generics #74694
    8.0.0
  • AddHttpClient configuration action is never called #83772
  • watchdog still seems to be killing test runs too early #83654
  • We should enable CS1591 on projects that have migrated their docs #49120
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException on decoding base64 bytes with LF characters included (>= .NET 5 only) #76918
    8.0.0
  • Optimize GC series for cases where all instance fields could be represented as a single serie #83111
    8.0.0
  • Support plan for parsing of Binary numeric literal strings, e.g., Convert.Int32("0b1011") #19642
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.ToString Methods #61719
    Future
  • Allow int.ToString and Parse to support radixes other than base-10 and base-16 #50491
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf SquareRootBenchmark #79294
  • net7: ValidationProblemDetails cannot be handled by JsonSerializerContext #83815
  • Regressions due to ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw helpers #79618
  • [API Proposal]: Enum should implement IBitwiseOperators, IEqualityOperators #81664
  • [Perf][Mono] Linux/arm64 Regressions due to rewritten of Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 #80570
  • Regressions around IndexOf #80441
  • [API Proposal]: Add analyzer for Environment.SystemDirectory #83591
  • Lazy: ValueFactory attempted to access the Value property of this instance #83163
  • Inconsistent AM- and PMDesignators within DateTimeFormat of CultureInfo #83810
  • [API Proposal]: `Vector.Contains(scalar)`, `.IndexOf(scalar)` and `LastIndexOf(scalar)` #83010
  • [API Proposal]: TryParseExplicit/ParseExplicit #83058
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20]The type of exception changed from TaskCanceledException to OperationCanceledException #83382
  • IndexOf-related regressions #83395
  • DisallowAllDefaultValues behaves unexpectedly for null #83797
  • Blazor WASM: Assertion error and uncaught promise in AuthorizationService.ts #81229
    8.0.0
  • TraceListenerCollection is not thread-safe #16643
    Future
  • Replace strings with resources in Mono corelib #34056
    Future
  • Update MsQuic version in helix docker images #83782
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding WriteVoidEndElement and Depth to XmlTextWriter #82091
  • Backport #63582 to net6.0 (ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER in PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister) #79959
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83572
  • can't load XmlSerializer lib on .Net 6.0 and .Net 7.0 #83662

PullRequests

Created

  • Move version.cpp out of hostcommon - only used by hostpolicy #83864
    area-Host
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: experimental changes to redundant branch opts #83859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More precise fix for #83792 #83856
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Utf8.TryWrite #83852
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Handle custom modifiers on parameter constraints #83850
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][debugger] Trying to fix dereference null pointer #83849
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement the STJ.DisableDefaultReflection feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix recGetStaticFieldCurrentClass #83843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test] Remove dotnet7 feeds from NuGet.config #83841
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83835
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83834
  • Try to workaround #80619 #83832
    area-Build-mono
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [main] Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83826
  • [mono][sgen] Remove outdated assertion #83824
    area-GC-mono
  • Issue 83667 #83820
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83819
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop creating "location" commas #83814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] Exclude PInvoke with function pointer in TimeZoneTests from wasm compilation #83805
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Add note to doc about not specifying `hostfxr_initialize_parameters::dotnet_root` #83802
    area-Host
  • enable SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue on arm32 Ubuntu #83799
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview3] [tvOS] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83727
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix marshaller types in attributes for exception marshallers and fix non-generic managed type with generic marshaller cases #80461
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Try to work around NuGet-Migrations issue #83833
  • [mono][debugger] Trying to fix dereference null pointer #83848
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: ensure we keep throw blocks cold when combining blocks #83842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update know issues template to actually contain modifiable json #83846
    area-Meta
  • better link to open new issues in other repos #83839
    area-Meta
  • Add Symbolication to XUnitLogChecker #83702
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable xunit.analyzers in merged test groups #83806
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • When the aggressive GCCollectionMode is specified, make sure the compacting parameter is set appropriately #83708
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Load levels explanation #83840
    area-Meta
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • Update debug-dump-template.md AzDO tenant link #83845
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Using canonical All-pointers GC desc in more scenarios. #83800
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Adjust Test Watcher Timeout for Test Collections #83746
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83786
    area-Meta
  • Fix typo in `IEqualityComparer` comment string #83809
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Mono: Replace exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add template to open a known issue with populated JSON #83801
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] More accurate jiterpreter cfg size estimation; generate smaller dispatch tables #83759
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Stop displaying missing info in replay runs #83788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Temporary workaround for #83792 #83794
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Reduce size of async state machine by a reference field #83696
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Dump Jit flags textually in mcs #83865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Remove presumably-useless? serializability checks #80957
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Fix for issue #78866 and regression test #83697
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [mono] Futher cleanups to delegate invocation #83705
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#81101) #83565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 7.0.6
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing #83577
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #82718
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: stop copying EH tab info into inlinee compiler #83622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Using together with .NET 8 SDK #2235

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Return complex structs by reference #2237
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Return GC primitives (and structs wrapping them) by value #2236

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement `ldvirtftn` support #2223
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Export symbols on Emscripten #2232
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement inline delegate invoke #2225
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Spill GC temps live across safe points #2222
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement support for lazy virtual tables #2224
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [preview][tizen] 8 and 7 both preview build tizen not works #31366
  • After auto-update VS cant find CrossGen target. #31356
  • Add workload force clean option #19603
    8.0.1xx
  • Backport Docker `--platform` switch support to .NET 7.latest #31133

Updated

  • Workloads distribution and management is understandable and seamless for developers #30008
    .NET 8.0
  • Cannot control verbosity with `dotnet tool restore --verbosity` #27153
    8.0.1xx
  • [Bug]: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets(176,5): error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly. #30755
  • Cannot build release net7.0-ios #31261
  • BindingRedirects not generated for a specific reference #2547
    Discussion
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • dotnet publish large use ram #31259
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Update off by default values with the ASP.NET request delegate source generator assembly name. #31422
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add breaking change notification to the bot #31413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • bump version of the SDK container support to the latest release #31410
    untriaged
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Investigation: check tests running on full framework #31399
    untriaged
  • Choose KnownILCompilerPacks based on TFM + RID #31398
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2142746 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Backport] Workload Clean for 8.0 Preview 3 #31411
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31343
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a typo #26244
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Reenable a skipped cppcli test. #31386
    untriaged
  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Build should not show the "Does not support publish of C++/CLI projec… #12333
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make SdkFeatureBand internal (sometimes) #31388
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unused using" incorrectly reported in IDE #67473
  • ToDisplayString for IParameterSymbol adds parameter name nomatter the settings (by default) #67464
  • Outlining - Collapse #regions on file open not working #67463
  • Settings search filter does not show all hits #67462
  • Syntax actions not always called in Roslyn 4.5.0 #67458
  • Iterator state machines frequently have unnecessary duplicate fields #67457
  • Async/iterator state machine <>1__state field can be smaller in most cases #67456

Closed

  • Compiler generates unused RefSafetyRulesAttribute type #67472
  • Stop silently adding 'using' directives when no auto-completion has been requested #67372
  • Incremental source generator hint name issue #57991
    17.6
  • CS8785 ForAttributeWithMetadataName issue with source generator #64841
    17.6
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator failing with ArgumentException #66451
  • `using static` doesn't work for extension methods #67438

PullRequests

Created

  • Change inline hint to inline hints #67475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove automatic background compiling/parsing in roslyn. #67474
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle arglist in GetValEscape #67471
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove concept of metadata assemblies that we dump to recoverable storage. #67470
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable state of null coalesing assignment should inherit from nullable type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document break for implicit locals of restricted type in async code #67466
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, 17.7
  • Attempt to repro issue 66960 #67465
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67460
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Catch user exceptions from source generator comparer #67459
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle unexpected NullableWalker state #67453
    Area-Compilers, 17.6

Merged

  • Add inline hints options to lsp #67455
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't trigger completion in argument list #67467
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Building, Debugging, Testing instructions for VS #67451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Compute new brace-pair tags when the view is scrolled #67454
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove synchronous fire-and-forget mutation apis from TestWorkspace #67450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Checking escape characters when classification virtual character sequence #67444
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Add support in LSP code for hosting workspaces that don't keep an independent view of the current solution. #67443
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2140648 #67418
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Service Worker is not updated on save or build #47388
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #47386
  • Dictionary<string, object> in Form has null value #47383
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47382
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #47381
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc, plaintext #47380
  • Blazor Hybrid wrapper for hls.js fails to play hls media served on local LAN #47379

Closed

  • IIS Express process memory size is not decreased. #47351
  • Different implementations of `GenerateRadioButton()` and `GenerateCheckBox()` in `DefaultHtmlGenerator.cs` #46535
  • gRPC JSON transcoding query string binding doesn't support directly converting known types #46753
  • OnStarting cannot be set because the response has already started. #47371
  • String array queries do not use commas to separate each element #46530

PullRequests

Created

  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding to prioritize JSON name #47385
    area-grpc

Merged

  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0-preview3] Follow up 'Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity' #47354
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Resolve parent cultures via parent property instead of string process… #47365
    area-mvc, area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    Perf, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, pending-ci-rerun
  • Run Mvc.Razor.HelperResult callbacks inline #47373
    area-mvc
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • User Story: Cloud Native developers have the tools to be able to collect traces and dumps in container environments and perform 1st level analysis on them #3761
    8.0.0
  • dotnet dump analyze's `gcroot -all <address>` crashes on arm64 #3726
    8.0.0
  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0
  • dotnet tools do not work on mac when running dll directly #3682
    Future
  • Single File module scan takes a very long time (symbol lookup) #3737
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for the large-offset stresslog format. #3779
    sos

Merged

  • Fix !gcroot issue #3777

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assets file doesn't have a target for net7.0 #14175
  • Unable to scroll to keyboard #14173
  • Custom handler freezes VS #14172
  • Unable to compile solution on VS for MAC #14169
  • [iOS ,MAC]Border overlapped with content view label when setting clip #14164
  • .Net Maui Hybrid + Paypal, Smart payment button works very well on Android, but not on Iphone #14162
  • Control's Loaded event invokes before calling its measure override method. #14160
  • Source Generators crash/fail with duplicate types #14158
    Backlog
  • The Image.Source data binding does not react to BindingContext changes #14157
  • Tap gesture on Content is blocking the pinch gesture on ContentView #14154
  • Button in release, cannot change the background color #14153

Closed

  • Image sizing does not work correctly #13913
  • Set Focus on custom control #13969
  • Android and iOS: BackgroundColor and TextColor properties are not getting applied for Button if they are set based on Converters #13865
    Backlog
  • ScrollView inside Border does not render offscreen content after scroll. iOS only. #14091
    Backlog
  • MAUI Template not showing up in VS 17.5.2 #14001
  • [Bug] Not all controls are currently working with RTL #2255
    Backlog
  • App Lifecycle event OnResume called more than once. #7894
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Windows: Window was already activated when minimize and restore from taskbar #14142
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SecureStorage throws InvalidProtocolBufferException on some devices #13597
    Backlog
  • HorizontalOptions Fill does not have any effect on the HorizontalStackLayout #14087
  • Button in Maui Transparent #13317
  • Appshell navigation is not working as desired. #13732
  • .Net Maui UI issues on release apk (Text disappear on buttons) #13919
  • Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR) on Opening Maps when running on Release mode on .net 8.0 Preview . #13947
  • Button, switch #13949
  • Masking(PatternMask) with MudBlazor not working in Blazor hybrid #13834
  • Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech Crash on iOS #13878
  • VS 2022 17.5 DEP0700 on Windows - "BaseSize="128,128"" is now required on MauiSplashScreen in csproj #13918
  • switch and underline #13950

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #14176
  • Make Windows FrameRenderer border measure area on resize #14174
  • SourceGen now supports internal duplicate types #14171
  • Merge main@30b141c9 into net8.0 #14170

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Added Gallery sample to validate that colors changes from Converters #14161
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [net7.0] Fix Android ListView header / footer gone (#12312) #14163
    area/ListView
  • [net7.0] Ensure that Grid is treating star rows/columns as Auto when unconstrained #14165
    area/layout 🔲
  • Workaround Multiple Calls to Activate #14152
  • [Android] Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14151
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Update with main and update MAUI previous versions #14156
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1587.40 to 1.0.1661.34 #14094
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make KeyboardAutoManagerScroll Public #14103
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 #14146
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Revert "Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property (#7442)" #14147

Updated

  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️, blocked
  • [Essentials] Remove lock from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net6.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14106
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14150
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
    area/platform
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 #13581
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Add TitleView to VisualChildren list for Page/Shell #14006
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EF CORE 7] Ability in an entity to Map a property targeting a View #30567
  • Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30565
  • Translate constructors to SQL #30564
  • Porting Entity Framework to EF: constraints naming #30562
  • OwnsMany when updating owner entity doesn't perform insert statement if the owned entity contains a Guid property #30558
  • Navigation expression doesn't work in user defined function #30557
  • Table-Valued Parameter from local List with Join of DbSet #30556
  • `Select(x => x.Parent.Field).Count().Distinct()` produces an inefficient query #30555

Closed

  • TemporalAll() exception: Either the query source is not an entity type, or the specified property does not exist on the entity type. #30561
  • Circular dependency exception when switching values for unique index fields #30560
  • Why the collection of related entities includes only one entity and not all? #30559

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #30266 - Linq select cannot project an entity containing both Json columns and ICollections #30566

Updated

  • Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30537
